message: Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm feeling generous today.
Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
This is my final offer, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make up for the inflation.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to make one more deal. With inflation, my share is still worth the same, but yours is losing value fast. Take this and run.
